DOC.detailed_description: This study multicenter Phase 3 , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled safety efficacy study Dimebon treatment subject Huntington disease ( HD ) . The study evaluate Dimebon 20 mg three time daily ( TID ) administer orally ( PO ) six month ( 26 week ) compare match placebo TID primary safety efficacy analysis . Safety tolerability assess record adverse event monitor vital sign , physical examination , safety laboratory evaluation , 12-lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) assessment .
